name: Vocaldo
description:
Vocaldo is an AI-powered speech-to-text and transcription tool that we believe will complement your experience with Verbatik perfectly. Here's why we think you'll love it:
üåç Transcribe in 100+ Languages: Accurate speech-to-text conversion for a global audience.
‚ö° Lightning-Fast Results: Get your transcriptions in minutes, not hours.
üíØ Unmatched Accuracy: Our AI engine ensures reliable and precise transcripts.
üìÑ Multiple Formats: Download your transcripts in TXT, SRT, or VTT formats.
üîí Secure & Confidential: Your audio files and transcripts are always protected.
The best part? Vocaldo is practically free to use! We're offering a generous free tier that includes:

10 transcriptions per day
Up to 120 minutes of total audio length
Support for all languages

This free tier comes with a small Vocaldo watermark, which helps us share and grow the product. For most users, this free tier will be more than enough to meet their transcription needs.
